message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $18,000.  What are your thoughts?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I can't go as low as $12,000. Could you meet me halfway at $15,000?
I appreciate the compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13,500.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  To move this forward, I'm willing to come down to $14,250. I believe this is a fair reflection of its value.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit far from my target price. I'm willing to meet you at $13,000.
